items.title: Date
items.description: Date field type is used to store date values. NocoDB supports a wide range of date formats, as detailed in the table below.

items.title: Date Time
items.description: Date Time field type is used to store both date and time values in a single field.

items.title: Duration
items.description: Duration field type is used to store duration of time in seconds or minutes. Different formats are supported by NocoDB, as detailed in the table below.

items.title: Time
items.description: Time field type is used to store time values in a single column. Time formats supported by NocoDB are listed in the table below.
